page.title: 17Shopping.
page.content: Shopkeepers say that business is not good. Shops have{closed}in Wednesbury, Darlaston and Great Bridge. More people say they go shopping by car to places with parking like the Asda stores in Darlaston and Tipton - many go out of the area altogether to Savacentre in Oldbury. By bus it is just as easy for many people in the area to go to Walsall, West Bromwich or Dudley which are very close and have bigger shopping centres with more shops to choose from. Changes to the roads around the Bull Stake in Darlaston and Union Street in Wednesbury have made it easier and safer to walk around the shops but some people said they liked it better the way it was before.
